Text:
Thanks so much for this, naxosking.  It is very hard to get so I am very grateful!

HQH.

A late thank you  - a series of this quality deserves
more than two comments

After downloading this torrent, I also found the missing pilot episode, not on GUBA, as the info.txt states (404 Not Found), but from UseNeXT.

I have added it to the collection and am now re-seeding the whole thing at:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4368041/Rumpole_of_the_Bailey_(Complete_TV_Series_with_Pilot_Episode_and

Also, for anyone who might be interested, I've found a torrent of some Rumpole BBC radio plays, but it's not on TPB, at least, I can't find it.

I got that torrent from:

http://fenopy.com/torrent/Rumpole_of_the_Bailey_by_John_Mortimer___BBC_Radio___SeymourDAC/MTEwMTAyMw==/download.torrent

It's downloading now.  When it completes, I'll re-seed it to TPB.

A magnificent torrent...absolutely bloody superb.   You went to a lot of bother to rip all of this stuff for us, and I for one appreciate all the effort involved.   Thank you.

a=10
v=10
An even more belated thank you for still seeding this superb rip of a superb series in selectable files.
Please continue seeding, I've just found out about this torrent and just started downloading. Thank you again for uploading this superb legal series.
